examples: Can you please answer this question?
She gave a detailed answer to the interviewer.
He didn't know the answer to the riddle.
Você poderia por favor responder a esta pergunta?
Ela deu uma resposta detalhada ao entrevistador.
Ele não sabia a resposta para o enigma.

suggested: Why did the math book look so sad? It had too many problems and not enough answers!
Not receiving an answer to an important question can leave you feeling disappointed and uncertain.
I get so angry when people dodge questions and refuse to give a straight answer.
Did you know that some answers lie within us, waiting to be discovered through self-reflection?
The sweet smell of success when you find the right answer to a challenging problem.
The satisfaction of finding an answer after searching and exploring various possibilities.
Finding common answers and understanding can create a sense of connection and harmony between individuals.
